# Description of DataSchema variable

The description of harmonised variable is the following:

* Short name: `employed`
* Variable label: `Participant has currently paid employement`
* Variable description: `Paid employment pertains to currently doing full- or part-time paid work (not including volunteering, housework or providing care (unless paid)). Respondents may be retired, while still undertaking some form of paid work`
* Domain: `Socio-demographic and economic characteristics`
* Value type: `categorical`
* Category coding:

**Code** | **Category Label**
-------- | ------------------
0        | No
1        | Yes

* Category missings: 

**Code** | **Category Label**
----| ------------------
991 | CAPI/interviewer error
992 | Impute
993 | Disable to measure
994 | Not attempt/not done
995 | Does not answer
996 | Not applicable
997 | Refuse
998 | Do not know
999 | Missing
